## useDebouncedCallback() function

Apply debounce to callback

If callback wasn't invoked during specified time, last call will be invoked

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function useDebouncedCallback<P extends unknown[]>(callback: EventCallback<P>, delay?: number): EventCallback<P>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | [EventCallback](./react-hooks.eventcallback.md)<!-- -->&lt;P&gt; | callback to debounce |
|  delay | number | <i>(Optional)</i> debounce time (if zero or undefined, debounce will not be applied) |

<b>Returns:</b>

[EventCallback](./react-hooks.eventcallback.md)<!-- -->&lt;P&gt;

debounced callback
